revised_title: Election of Fellows at the Annual Meeting, June 3, 1881
tldr: At the Annual Meeting of the Royal Society on June 3, 1881, several candidates were elected as fellows. The meeting also discussed the power of rendering rice grain diastatic and expressed gratitude to Hiroyuki Kato, President of the University of Tokio, and Jihei Kameyama, proprietor of the Ttoji manufactory in Yushima, Tokio, for their assistance.
